techmeme.title: Pinterest says it is developing tools to label AI-generated or AI-altered content on its platform, amid an influx of AI slop from SEO spammers (Maggie Harrison/Futurism)
China mandates regulatory approvals for autonomous driving-related OTA software upgrades, aiming to prevent automakers from hiding defects or avoiding liability (Reuters)
The US SEC dismissed or paused at least eight cases against crypto firms in the past month, as the agency sees immediate changes under Acting Chair Mark Uyeda (Emily Nicolle/Bloomberg)
Metronome, which offers APIs to help SaaS companies charge customers based on usage, raised a $50M Series C led by NEA, bringing its total funding to $128M (Allie Garfinkle/Fortune)
Auditoria.AI, which develops AI agents to automate tasks and provide insights for enterprise finance teams, raised a $38M Series B led by Innovius Capital (PYMNTS.com)
